# [Interview #1034: Interview with Brandon Sanderson - Chris King (Miyabi), Entry #19](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1034#19)

#### Chris King (Miyabi)

And here is the last one for Sel: Does Shu-Keseg predate the splintering of Devotion and Dominion?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No, I don't believe it does.
